content:
Here is an episode of the Resoundingly Human podcast where two IBM data scientists (Dr. Nasim Lari and Will Rosenfeld), who are members of INFORMS Washington DC chapter, join the host and discuss FHIR and interoperability. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/resoundingly-human-speaking-language-healthcare-data/id1428964002?i=1000473045771

(Full Disclosure: I work with Will and Dr. Lari, but I would still have advertised this podcast even if I didn't)
